title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; no backend code needed.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/generate inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service for CI pipelines (test prompts, benchmarks).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: same generate/chat/embed API as Python/JS SDKs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async HTTP wrapper and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client library for Ollama using std.http.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints with Tokio/async support.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a side-panel chat powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack: Ollama + Qdrant + LangChain backend + React frontend for RAG.
